overview: Reality shows are the hottest thing to hit TV in the last decade. Now, for the first time ever, several of the brightest stars from the hottest reality shows unite for one unforgettable night of TOO HOT FOR TV fun. Going where no reality show has dared to go, fourteen of the most popular stars came together in a Los Angeles pub to share the ultimate dish!
tagline: Reality all stars come together for one hot and revealing night!
title: Reality Unleashed
